info.name: Consumer API
info.description:
This is a Postman Collection for the ***Consumer API*** endpoints. 

Refer to the main [Consumer API documentation](<link>) for more details.

If you have an API-related question, you can also discuss in the developer [community forum](<link>).



## Installation ##

### Quick install

Go to the [Collection](<link>) and click `Run in Postman`.

### Manual install

You can also download this Collection from a GitHub repo here: [github_link](<link>)


## Environment

This Collection includes a pre-configured Environment. You will need to set up the following variable in order to run each request. Otherwise you have to manually put your baseurl for every request  :

|Name|Description|
|---|---|
|`baseurl`|Your Base URL|

***To send a request, you need to add cookie in header.***

item.name: Catalog
Get Catalog List Of A Store

request.description:
Get catalogs list for any given store **URL** : `/enrollment/catalogs/?store__url_slug=` **Method** : `GET` **Response** : ```json { "url": "https://api.account.dev.campus.com/enrollment/catalogs/?store__url_slug=campus", "date_time": "2021-03-04T04:26:13.408393Z", "success": true, "status": 200, "total": 4, "data": [ { "id": "f9fef7df-e6a9-4970-9d96-5a88b321719b", "title": "Career Building", "slug": "career-building", "image": "https://static.dev.campus.com/uploads/b6975b8b-64ab-4d77-b608-53680a856331.jpg", "description": "

Career Building courses prepare new graduates to join the professional work environment. From resume writing to interviewing, networking to managing personal finances, these courses teach young professionals the life skills that a traditional education may have left behind.

", "course_count": 0 }, { "id": "b85a3656-0be3-43f1-897d-fd7df81c043a", "title": "Banking", "slug": "banking", "image": null, "description": "

Develop the skills needed to succeed as a banking professional and grow your career in the financial services industry.

", "course_count": 0 }, { "id": "d5b10b98-5cdf-492d-a516-54939bee4a7d", "title": "Business Analysis", "slug": "business-analysis", "image": null, "description": "

Business Analysis courses help you develop solutions that address business needs and add value to your organization. As you prepare for career-enhancing certifications and accreditations, you will gain insight into approaches that integrate business analysis principles into plans and programs that meet stakeholder needs and fulfill organizational requirements.

", "course_count": 0 }, { "id": "7fcaac32-7a7b-4cba-9a98-a427043c2e81", "title": "Agile Project Management", "slug": "agile-project-management", "image": "https://static.dev.campus.com/uploads/9d9203bf-ffaf-44b0-b588-5ebd258aff08.png", "description": "

These days, project management is multidimensional depending on the project, industry, and team. MindEdge's Agile program of coursework teaches the principles Agile Project Management, an iterative, skinnied-down approach to project management for teams that must move quickly. Add this approach to your project management toolbox to be even more marketable to businesses and valued within your organization.

", "course_count": 2 } ] } ```

item.name: Get Catalog Details Of A Store

item.description: Here you can get ***Catalog*** related endpoints.

item.name: Store

request.description:
Get store details.

**URL** : `/registration/store/?url_slug=<store_url_slug>`

**Method** : `GET`

**Response** :

```json
{
    "id": "dcb786c0-e629-486b-ad77-d0e6e204d0be",
    "name": "Testing Template Store Nafisa",
    "url_slug": "testing-template-store-nafisa",
    "is_active": false,
    "store_logo_uri": null,
    "gtm_id": null,
    "template": "https://static.dev.campus.com/uploads/testing-template-store-nafisa.20210804t121122.js"
}
```

item.description: Here you can get ***Store*** related endpoints.

item.name: Course
item.description: Here you can get ***Store*** related endpoints.

item.name: Careers

request.description:
Save a career as favorite

**URL :** `/enrollment/careers/`

**Method :** `POST`

**Payload :** 

```json
{
    "soc_code": "27-2011.00"
}
```

**Response :** 

```json
{
    "url": "https://api.account.dev.campus.com/enrollment/careers/",
    "date_time": "2021-04-08T07:05:41.331361Z",
    "success": true,
    "data": {
        "id": "4c065ae1-5b6b-4084-a151-343d9ca9e3b9",
        "soc_code": "27-2011.00"
    }
}

```

Unsave a career as favorite

**URL :** `/enrollment/careers`

**Method :** `DELETE`

**Payload :** 

```json
{
    "soc_code": "13-2011.01"
}
```

**Response :** 

```json
{
    "url": "https://api.account.dev.campus.com/enrollment/careers/",
    "date_time": "2021-04-08T07:07:39.041062Z",
    "success": true,
    "data": {
        "id": "None",
        "soc_code": "13-2011.01",
        "status": "deleted"
    }
}

```

item.description: Here you can get ***My Favorites- Career*** related endpoints.

item.name: Profile

request.description:
Get profile information

**URL :** `/registration/profile/`

**Method :** `GET`

**Response :** 

```json
{
    "id": "e424c1d9-c4cc-4cd6-8cd2-49142eff67f7",
    "first_name": "Thomas",
    "formal_name": "Charles, Thomas",
    "last_name": "Charles",
    "date_of_birth": null,
    "profile_picture_uri": "https://static.dev.campus.com/uploads/516b80a7-557d-4f16-a586-1c2780eefd2f.jpg",
    "primary_email": "thomas.charles202129@gmail.com",
    "primary_contact_number": null,
    "terms_accepted": true,
    "profile_preferences": [
        {
            "id": "abcf94a2-0370-44bd-bdd3-1abef6dd493e",
            "preference_type": "NEWSLETTER_SUBSCRIPTION",
            "preference_value": "0"
        }
    ],
    "profile_store": {
        "id": "b4e5683c-4ae7-4d12-bc05-5a0053d835b6",
        "name": "Lifelong Campus",
        "url_slug": "campus"
    }
}
```

item.name: Create Profile for Guest Checkout Enrollment

request.description:
Create profile
**URL :** `/enrollment/create-profile/?guest=true`

**Method :** `POST`

**Payload :** 

```json
{
  "first_name" : "Thomas", 
  "last_name" : "Charles", 
  "primary_email" : "thomas.charles202129@gmail.com"
}

```

**Response :** 

```json
{
    "id": "e424c1d9-c4cc-4cd6-8cd2-49142eff67f7",
    "primary_email": "thomas.charles202129@gmail.com",
    "first_name": "Thomas",
    "last_name": "Charles"
}

```

item.description: Here you can get ***Profile*** related endpoints.

item.name: My Persona

request.description:
Get my persona after taking quiz

**URL :** `/enrollment/persona/`

**Method :** `GET`

**Response :** 

```json
{
    "url": "https://api.account.dev.campus.com/enrollment/persona/",
    "date_time": "2021-08-08T06:35:06.631311Z",
    "success": true,
    "data": {
        "persona": {
            "a": 5,
            "c": 5,
            "e": 1.25,
            "i": 3.75,
            "r": 2.5,
            "s": 0
        }
    }
}
```

item.description: Here you can get ***My Persona*** related endpoints.

item.name: Coupon

request.description:
Validate a Coupon

**URL :** `/enrollment/coupon-validate/`

**Method :** `POST`

**Payload :** 

```json
{
"cart_id": "d23eb55c-9983-4396-8729-62b166627ff7",
"coupon_code": "new05",
"store_slug": "campus"
}
```

**Response :** 

```json
{
    "discounted_price": 232.5,
    "discount": 77.5
}

```

item.description: Here you can get ***Coupon*** related endpoints.

item.name: Sales Tax

request.description:
Check sales tax

**URL :** `/enrollment/tax/`

**Method :** `POST`

**Payload :** 

```json
{
"cart_id": "d23eb55c-9983-4396-8729-62b166627ff7",
"country": "USA",
"store_slug": "campus",
"zip_code": "01430"
}
```

**Response :** 

```json
{
    "total_amount": 0.0
}
```

item.description: Here you can get ***Sales Tax*** related endpoints.

item.name: Payment

request.description:
Initiate payment

**URL :** `/enrollment/payment-initiate/?store_payment_gateway_id=<store_payment_gateway_id>&cart_id=<cart_id>&zip_code=<zip_code>&country=USA&product_id=<product_id>`

**Method :** `GET`

**Response :** 

```json

```

Cancel cart payment

**URL :** `/enrollment/payment-cancel/?cart_id=<cart_id>/`

**Method :** `Get`


**Response :** 

```json
{
    "message": "Payment and cart cancelled"
}

```

item.description: Here you can get ***Payment*** related endpoints.
